statements: DELETE FROM order_execution_details WHERE order_id = 100 AND execution_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM order_execution_details WHERE execution_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND order_id = 200;
DELETE FROM order_timestamps WHERE order_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
DELETE FROM audit_logs WHERE event_description LIKE '%cancelled%' OR event_description LIKE '%returned%';
DELETE FROM order_details WHERE order_id = 100 AND quantity = 5;
DELETE FROM order_details WHERE order_id = 100 AND quantity > 10
DELETE FROM order_history WHERE status = 'cancelled' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01'
